New York Trailheads

Find local trails. Go outside.

  • Hiking Map
  • Biking Map

Looking for a local trail to ride a bike?
A mountain to climb?
On this site, you'll find guides to trails in upstate New York so you can get outside.

Sleeping Beauty Mountain

A moderately easy hike to a view of the southern portion of Lake George.
Read More

Shelving Rock Mountain

Following an old carriage road, this mountain offers a simple hike for families with a view of Lake George at the top.
Read More

Hadley Mountain

A relatively short hike to a rewarding view and a restored fire tower
Read More

Zim Smith Trail

A 9 mile multi-use trail extending from Halfmoon to Ballston Spa
Read More

Ushers Road State Forest

Located just off Northway Exit 10, this old growth forest contains a short loop trail, along with a connection to the Zim Smith Trail.
Read More

Buck Mountain

Buck Mountain offers one of the most beautiful views available of Lake George.
Read More
